summary: When a strange virus quickly spreads through a safari park and turns all the zoo animals undead, those left in the park must stop the creatures before they escape and zombify the whole city.
cast: Ione Butler|Andrew Asper|LaLa Nestor|Kim Nielsen|Marcus Anderson Jr.|Brianna Joy Chomer|Ivan Djurovic|Aaron Groben|Kaiwi Lyman|William McMichael|Reuben Uy|Isaac Anderson|Tammy Klein|Cedric Jonathan|Joe Conti|Noa Pharaoh|Jennifer Titus|Michael Delgado|Jay Kwon|Bryan Sloyer|Jumarcus Mason
director: Director: Glenn Miller (as Glenn R. Miller)
title: Zoombies
